welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fayetteville, where Southern charm meets thriving arts and outdoor adventures. Get ready to explore our historic downtown, vibrant cultural scene, and beautiful natural surroundings. We hope you enjoy your time in our wonderful city!

restaurants.name: Truett’s Luau
restaurants.description: Truett’s Luau is a hawaiian restaurant located in Fayetteville.
restaurants.address: 600 Lanier Ave W Ste 103 (Grady Ave), Fayetteville, GA 30214
